top_comments.comment: The intro giving me corpse bride vibes

Omg... this was really well done and scary!!! Anyone ever told the girls that they are so good at dancing?! They really pulled off the zombie dancing (their body control wow) and expressions on point!! 😍😍😍 this is really so cool!!! I'm looking forward to more content of theirs!!!
the real zombie, this hit so hard lmaooo, i love it

Nice remix with a slightly slower pacing for that creepier version. Love the new dance moves. Overall efforts make this one a winner remix!

I'm literally speechless I don't know what to say. Purple Kiss is just plain perfect, they are beyond human, they are insane. I had to pause this video like 3-5 times on my watch just to recover from the pure talent that this fucking group has.

If anyone ever questions why they are my ults, this video could single handedly explain it. I simply adore this group so much
